data.text: Near the far end of the parking garage, you find a large, freestanding concrete pillar. It's similar to the ones that hold up the upper levels, but this one is clearly not connected to anything else and isn't a structural component. You're initially not sure what to make of it, until you notice a slate-grey barrier medallion embedded in the lower portion. Pulling it out is impossible; you'll have to break the thing.
You approach the strange pillar with the medallion embedded in it, preparing to try again. It seems to have completed repaired any damage you did on the last attempt.
As you approach, dull grey light begins to gather around the pillar; powerful magic hums in the air. You'd better be quick before the thing vaporizes you.
